name: Double Kick
description: You strike twice with two devastating kicks. Make two melee attack rolls, doing 1d6 + MOVE fighting damage on each successful hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice rolls for this move changes to 1d10 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 5d4 at level 17.

contest.effect: Badly startles Pok√©mon that used a move of the same type.
